Data: Jonkman to Hayden, FOUR runs another four. It's raining boundaries here. Drifting down the leg side, flicked away fine.
Jonkman to Hayden, no run turned to the leg side, Gilchrist runs in from the other end, Hayden sends him back and he just makes in time to beat the direct hit
Jonkman to Hayden, SIX runs Bosh! Short and Hayden pulls it over deep midwicket. Caught by a man from Boony Army! Pity for Holland that he was standing in the stands!
Jonkman to Hayden, 1 run short of length, outside off stump, pushed to cover point
Jonkman to Gilchrist, no run slower one on the middle stump line, defended away
Jonkman to Gilchrist, no run lands outside off stump, comes in, punched to mid-on
de Leede to Hayden, no run on the middle stump line ,full in length, driven back to the bowler
de Leede to Hayden, no run similar length, line is towards off stump, pushed out to cover
de Leede to Hayden, FOUR runs Clubbed away! Short of length, just outside off stump and he swipes it across the line past short midwicket.
de Leede to Hayden, no run he is going for it, every delivery now. Another swing at a length-delivery, doesn't connect well, goes towards mid-on
de Leede to Hayden, OUT Hayden falls going for the broke. Slow offcutter outside off stump, Hayden has one wild swing, and edges it to Borren at point.
de Leede to Gilchrist, no run another slow delivery on the middle stump line, driven to the bowler.
Ryan ten Doeschate to Ponting, 1 wide gets it straighter, on the middle stump line, driven to mid-on
Ryan ten Doeschate to Ponting, no run
Ryan ten Doeschate to Ponting, no run full and on the middle stump line, turned to square-leg
Ryan ten Doeschate to Ponting, FOUR runs There he goes. Overpitched on the legs, Ponting leans forward and whips it past midwicket
Ryan ten Doeschate to Ponting, FOUR runs Another four. no surprise eh? On the stumps, Ponting goes down town. Drives straight down the ground
Ryan ten Doeschate to Ponting, no run

Ryan ten Doeschate to Ponting, 1 leg bye Short of length, on the off and middle stump line, Ponting shapes to pull but is beaten by the bounce and the pace. I mean lack of it. It didn't rise high nor did it come through. And it bounds off the pads to the backward point region
de Leede to Ponting, 1 run full and straight, on the middle and leg, driven to mid-on and he sets off for a single
de Leede to Gilchrist, no run slower offcutter, on the middle and off stump line, Gilchrist waits for it to arrive, guides it to point
de Leede to Gilchrist, no run fuller and faster, driven to mid-off
de Leede to Gilchrist, no run slower one on the middle and leg stump line, he is bowling a orgy of slower ones here, pushed out to mid-off.
de Leede to Gilchrist, no run Was it a another slower one? Hmm... offcutter on the off stump, cut to point
Ryan ten Doeschate to Ponting, no run around off stump, driven to cover
Ryan ten Doeschate to Ponting, no run length-delivery on the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
Ryan ten Doeschate to Ponting, no run similar line, nudged towards point. Good over so far.
Ryan ten Doeschate to Ponting, no run low full toss, hint of swing in and Ponting pushes it tamely back to the bowler
Ryan ten Doeschate to Ponting, FOUR runs Another low full toss and Ponting is no monk. He is not going to forgive your errors again and again. Whips it through midwicket.
Ryan ten Doeschate to Ponting, no run
de Leede to Gilchrist, no run I think he is the slower one specialist. His change of pace, i think, is the faster one! another slowish cutter, played to cover
de Leede to Gilchrist, FOUR runs there comes the change in pace, faster and slipping down the leg side, flicked away.
de Leede to Gilchrist, no run gentle seam-up stuff on the off and middle, pushed to cover
de Leede to Gilchrist, no run there comes the slower one. off cutter, driven to mid-off.
de Leede to Gilchrist, no run another slow off cutter, driven back to the bowler.
de Leede to Gilchrist, 1 run fullish, on the middle and leg, driven to long-on
Ryan ten Doeschate to Gilchrist, FOUR runs overpitched on the legs, flicked away past square-leg. Don't bowl there boss. He will make you bleed.
Ryan ten Doeschate to Gilchrist, no run better. length-delivery, just outside off stump, pushed to cover
Ryan ten Doeschate to Gilchrist, 2 runs Fifty up for Gilchrist. Short and on the middle and leg stump line, pulled away to deep midwicket
Ryan ten Doeschate to Gilchrist, no run fuller and hint of inswing, on middle and leg, turned to square-leg
Ryan ten Doeschate to Gilchrist, no run
Ryan ten Doeschate to Gilchrist, no run
de Leede to Ponting, no run On the off stump line, coming in, Ricky Ponting pushes at it, gets a inside-edge on to he pads. They go up in appeal.
de Leede to Ponting, SIX runs Oh ho! There goes Ponting. Probably he was enraged by the earlier appeal. He leans forward to swing it over long-on!
de Leede to Ponting, no run
de Leede to Ponting, FOUR runs Slower one but Ponting picks it early, leans forward and sweeps it over square-leg.
de Leede to Ponting, no run outside off stump, shapes in, guided to point
de Leede to Ponting, no run fullish, around off stump line, driven powerfully but straight to cover
Ryan ten Doeschate to Gilchrist, no run length-delivery on the middle stump line, Gilchrist whips it ,in the air, to the left of short midwicket who makes a neat stop
Ryan ten Doeschate to Gilchrist, 1 run slightly short and outside off, cut to right of point where a diving half-stop is made
Ryan ten Doeschate to Ponting, 1 leg bye 122.2 kmph, fuller and faster (compared to the previous deliveries), on the legs, runs off the pads as Ponting fails to get a touch
Ryan ten Doeschate to Gilchrist, FOUR runs Wallop! Short and outside off, Gilchrist cuts it up and over point. No one home at deep point and he gets another boundary.
Ryan ten Doeschate to Gilchrist, 1 run corrects his length, hurls this fuller, on the off stump, driven to mid-off

Ryan ten Doeschate to Ponting, no run dropped by Zuiderant at midwicket! Fullish delivery, on the middle and leg, Ponting whips it hard but straight, at head-high, to Zuiderant who, I thought, had snaffled it but instead he clangs it. The ball bobbed out of his hand and he almost took it on the rebound and I t
de Leede to Gilchrist, no run length-delivery on the middle stump line, pushed back to the bowler.
de Leede to Gilchrist, no run
de Leede to Gilchrist, no run

de Leede to Gilchrist, OUT Gilchrist is back into the hutch! Full in length, on the middle and leg stump line, driven uppishly straight to mid-on who makes no mistake. He holds on to it and only then throws the ball up in the air, unlike the earlier let off to Ponting.
de Leede to Clarke, no run leans forward, defends down the track
de Leede to Clarke, no run full in length, on the middle stump line, worked to midwicket
Adeel Raja to Clarke, (no ball) starts off with a no-ball. Floated on the off stump line, driven back to the bowler
Adeel Raja to Clarke, 1 run Clarke does what he does best. Comes down the track to the spinner, drives to long on
Adeel Raja to Hodge, 1 run Hodge stays where he is, just leans forward to drive to long on
Adeel Raja to Clarke, 1 run lands outside off, turns in slightly, driven to long on. Can we pick some other spot please?
Adeel Raja to Hodge, no run leans forward and defends.
Adeel Raja to Hodge, no run And again. Ok if you want you can hit to long on... don't curb yourself.
Adeel Raja to Hodge, no run nice loopy offspinning delivery, Hodge is almost beaten in the flight as he, I am sure wanted to drive to long on, drives it back down the track.
de Leede to Clarke, no run full in length, on the middle stump line, Clarke lunges forward, whips it to midwicket
de Leede to Clarke, no run slightly short of length, on the off stump line, Clarke shapes to cut, not much room there sir, and he ends up chopping it to the off side
de Leede to Clarke, 1 run will get a single this time, with a drive to left of mid-off
de Leede to Hodge, 1 run slightly short, just outside off stump, Hodge gets back and across to cut it past point
de Leede to Clarke, no run fuller, and around off stump, driven to cover
de Leede to Clarke, no run off cutter, fullish, turned straight to midwicket.
Adeel Raja to Hodge, no run turns in from outside off stump. turned to the leg side.
Adeel Raja to Hodge, 1 run on the middle and leg, turns in, played behind square-leg
Adeel Raja to Clarke, no run flatter, on the off and middle stump line, punched to mid-on.
Adeel Raja to Clarke, no run nice. Clarke charges out but Raja drags back the length and Clarke pushes it out towards midwicket
Adeel Raja to Clarke, no run loopy delivery on the middle stump line, Clarke comes down again but can't get under the ball, turns it to midwicket. GOod bowling.
Adeel Raja to Clarke, no run deja-vu. Excellent stuff from Raja.
de Leede to Hodge, no run homes in on the off stump line, nudged to point
de Leede to Hodge, no run length-delivery, on the middle stump line, whipped to midwicket.
de Leede to Hodge, 1 wide wide down the leg side. Good work from the 'keeper who whips the bails off but Hodge had not gone anywhere
de Leede to Hodge, 1 run off cutter, on the middle stump line, turned with the spin to long leg
de Leede to Clarke, 1 run full-pitched on the middle stump line, driven to right of mid-on
de Leede to Hodge, no run homes in on the off stump, defended on the front foot
de Leede to Hodge, no run beaten! Another ambitious drive to a length-delivery outside off, bat meets thin air, ball goes into the 'keeper's gloves.
Adeel Raja to Clarke, 1 run pushed through quickly on off and middle stump, Clarke pushes it in front of midwicket and scampers through for a sharp single
Adeel Raja to Hodge, FOUR runs Hodge uses his feet to take the ball on the full, he drives it straight down the ground and with mid on adn mid off up in the circle that was always going to be four
Adeel Raja to Hodge, 1 run flicked off his pads behind square for a single
Adeel Raja to Clarke, 1 run Clarke hops down the track and plays it in front of midwicket for one more
Adeel Raja to Hodge, 1 run full length ball drifting on to off and middle stump, Hodge leans across and taps it wide of midwicket
Adeel Raja to Clarke, 1 run Clarke uses his feet to step down the track and nearly yorks himself, he manages to dig it out towards deep cover
de Leede to Clarke, 1 run full ball on middle and leg stump, Clarke flicks through midwicket for a single
de Leede to Hodge, 1 run played off the pads through square leg for one more
de Leede to Clarke, no run short ball and wide outside off stump, Clarke doesn't move his feet and reaches out for it, he cuts hard but can't beat point
de Leede to Clarke, no run full ball nearly in the blockhole outside off stump, Clarke plays it to cover
de Leede to Clarke, 1 run driven down to long on for a single
de Leede to Hodge, no run defended back to the bowler on the back foot
Adeel Raja to Clarke, no run Clarke steps down the track and defends on the front foot
Adeel Raja to Clarke, 1 run tossed up on off and middle stump, Clarke takes two steps down and works the ball through midwicket
Adeel Raja to Hodge, 1 run Hodge closes the face of the bat and plays it wide of the fielder at midwicket for one more
Adeel Raja to Clarke, 1 run and again he advances to Raja and drives him down the ground, Clarke does this really well against spin
Adeel Raja to Hodge, no run Raja drifts on to leg stump and Hodge sweeps him but can't beat the man at short fine leg
Adeel Raja to Hodge, 1 run pushed through midwicket on the front foot for a single to end the over
Borren to Hodge, no run short of alength ball outside off stump, Hodge stands on the back foot and cuts to point
Borren to Hodge, no run good length ball on off stump, Hodge tries to swipe it through the leg side but mis-hits it back to the bowler
Borren to Hodge, 2 runs Borren bowls the slower ball and Hodge gets deceived by the change of pace, he ends up scooping it over cover and the ball falls in no mans land
Borren to Hodge, no run driven hard into the ground and back to the bowler
Borren to Hodge, FOUR runs cut past point on the back foot, he's placed that superbly and third man has no chance in cutting that off
Borren to Hodge, no run defended towards cover point on the front foot
Adeel Raja to Clarke, no run defended to covers on the front foot
Adeel Raja to Clarke, no run on the off and middle stump line, pushed back to the bowler.
Adeel Raja to Clarke, FOUR runs Clarke goes down town. Charges out, didn't get to the pitch of the flighted delivery but he went through with the shot, up and over mid-on
Adeel Raja to Clarke, no run on the off and middle, pushed to the bowler
Adeel Raja to Clarke, 1 run comes down the track, drives a delivery to long-on
Adeel Raja to Hodge, 1 run straighter one outside off, nudged to backward point
Borren to Hodge, no run on the off and middle stump line, pushed to the on side
Borren to Hodge, 1 run short and Hodge swivels to pull it to deep midwicket.
Borren to Clarke, 1 run fuller and well outside off, Clarke reaches out for it like a greedy little boy would do for an ice cream and drives it to deep cover
Borren to Hodge, no run Hodge lets the ball come to him and drives to mid-off.
Borren to Hodge, 1 run just short of length, outside off stump, Hodge was committed on the front foot, waits and opens the bat-face to run it down to third man
Borren to Clarke, 1 run fuller and on the off and middle, driven to mid-on but he had placed it gently and knew immediately that there was a single in it.
Adeel Raja to Clarke, 1 run in the middle he comes down the track and drives to long-on
Adeel Raja to Hodge, 1 run slightly short, cut to point
Adeel Raja to Clarke, 1 run slower through the air, turns in from outside off, Clarke waits for it to arrive, nudges it close on the on side and rushes for a quick single
Adeel Raja to Hodge, 1 run another nice loopy delivery - This Raja is a good spinner- pushed to cover for a single
Adeel Raja to Clarke, 1 run Clarke comes down, Raja pushes it to the legs, driven down to long-on
Adeel Raja to Hodge, 1 run on the off and middle stump line, punched down to long-on
Borren to Hodge, no run length-delivery that comes in towards middle stump line, pushed to midwicket
Borren to Hodge, SIX runs Thwack! Full-pitched delivery outside off stump and Hodge knifes it over mid-off. A Aussie girl, in the crowd, throws up an Kangaroo doll in the air in delight. Hmm...
Borren to Hodge, 2 runs driven past mid-off
Borren to Hodge, no run
Borren to Hodge, no run
Borren to Hodge, no run slightly short, pulled to square-leg. Drinks.
Adeel Raja to Clarke, no run nice strangling delivery on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Adeel Raja to Clarke, FOUR runs Cute! arm-ball, outside off stump, slightly short and Clarke backs away and cuts it late. Very late.
Adeel Raja to Clarke, 1 run turns in from outside off, Clarke nudges it to cover point for a single
Adeel Raja to Hodge, 1 run nicely flighted, loops outside off stump, Hodge leans forward, drives to mid-off
Adeel Raja to Clarke, FOUR runs long-hop from Raja who was bowling so well. Clarke pulls it away to the boundary. Easy pickings there. That 'roo doll must have been thrown up again.
Adeel Raja to Clarke, 1 run tossed up on the middle stump line, driven to long on
Borren to Clarke, no run overpitched outside off, driven to cover
Borren to Clarke, 1 run leans forward, drives a full-pitched delivery, down to long-on
Borren to Hodge, 1 run
Borren to Clarke, no run length-delivery on the off stump line, worked to the on side
Borren to Clarke, 1 run another sliding delivery, on the middle stump line, punched on the up, towards long-on

Borren to Hodge, no run length-delivery outside off, Hodge tries to drive it, gets an inside-edge. For a moment he didn't know where it went - the truth is always under your nose sir, turns in all directions and ah.. there it is .. just outside off stump.
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, 2 runs slips down leg side, flicked to fine-leg
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, 2 runs full-pitched, whipped throught midwicket region
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, 1 run overpitched outside off, driven to long-off
Ryan ten Doeschate to Hodge, 1 run pinches a single with a drive to cover
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, 1 run another full in length, this time a single down to long on.
Ryan ten Doeschate to Hodge, 2 runs full and outside off stump, Hodge leans back and cuts it, not the length but he pulls it off, to wide third man
Borren to Clarke, 1 run full and on the middle stump, another single to long-on. Both the batsmen on 49.
Borren to Hodge, 1 wide full and slips down the leg side, Hodge tries to get a tickle but fails
Borren to Hodge, no run slower one outside off, Hodge reaches out and drives it back to the bowler
Borren to Hodge, no run still on 49. Whips a full-pitched delivery to midwicket
Borren to Hodge, 1 run slower one- leg break this time, Hodge reads it and reaches his first WC fifty with inside-out drive to sweeper cover
Borren to Clarke, FOUR runs Clarke gets to the landmark as well. Leans forward, reaches a wide delivery outside off and creams it through extra cover
Borren to Clarke, 1 run celebrates the fifty with a fierce punch through the line, past the bowler.

Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, FOUR runs Clarke backs away, ball is hurled full and outside off and Clarke reaches out and smokes it through backward point. The slog overs are on and Stephenson could be in for a treat.
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, 1 run Gets Hodge on strike with a drive to long on
Ryan ten Doeschate to Hodge, 1 run Hodge smashes a fullish delivery down the track, the bowler gets a hand, nearly deflects to the sticks - Clarke was out of his crease, and they will get a single
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, 1 run in the channel outside off stump, Clarke opens the bat-face , runs it for a single to backward point region
Ryan ten Doeschate to Hodge, no run appeal for lbw but going down leg side. Full and sliding in on to the legs, Hodge didnt' make contact with his swipe
Ryan ten Doeschate to Hodge, 2 runs ugly swipe across the line to deep midwicket
Borren to Clarke, 1 run
Borren to Hodge, no run sliding on the leg stump line, he tries to lap it around the corner, doesn't make proper contact
Borren to Hodge, 1 run low full-toss, swatted to long-on
Borren to Clarke, 1 run another low full toss, slogged, again not much contact, to square-leg
Borren to Hodge, 1 run The low full-tosses keep coming, dinked past square-leg
Borren to Clarke, 1 run slower one, slipping down leg side, tickled to short fine-leg
Jonkman to Clarke, 1 run length-delivery on the off stump, heaved away to long-on
Adeel Raja to Hodge, FOUR runs tossed up outside off stump, Hodge reaches out and smashes it, in the air, over cover , one-bounce over the ropes.
Adeel Raja to Hodge, SIX runs Boom Boom! flighted delivery on the middle stump line, slog-sweeps it over deep midwicket. Caught by an Aussie fan in the crowd. Well done sir.
Adeel Raja to Hodge, SIX runs Minnow bashing is on. Low full-toss and Hodge clubs it away, deep into the midwicket stand.

Adeel Raja to Hodge, FOUR runs Raja has got the yips, Another full toss and Hodge swatted it away towards left of long-on. Should have been caught butvan Bunge doesn't pick it up. He goes for it rather late and puts in a desperate dive but can't hold on.
Adeel Raja to Hodge, no run

Borren to Clarke, 1 run The full-tosses keep coming. So does desperate dives in the out field. Heaved to long-off, van Troost tries his best to get under it, it just brushes his fingers as he dives forward.
Borren to Hodge, 1 run full-pitched , driven to long-on
Borren to Clarke, 1 run 150 of the partnership comes up with a drive to long-on.
Borren to Hodge, 1 run slower one ,from the back of the hand, jabbed away to cover
Borren to Clarke, 1 run faster and full in length, drilled to long-on for a single.
Borren to Hodge, FOUR runs the fine-leg is up in the circle but he hurls this one on the legs and Hodge makes him pay. Swings it to fine-leg boundary.
Reekers to Clarke, 1 run gentle seam-up delivery on the off stump line, driven to long-off.
Reekers to Hodge, SIX runs Clean as a whistle! Flies over the Cow Corner. Took his left leg outside the line and hoicked it up and over.
Reekers to Hodge, 1 run rotates the strike with a single to midwicket
Reekers to Clarke, 1 run full and outside off, Clarke goes down on a bent knee, square-drives it to deep point
Reekers to Hodge, SIX runs The cow corner is being peppered here. Another swing and up she went in the air, the fielder tries to get a hand and ends up palming it over the ropes.
Reekers to Hodge, 1 run
Borren to Hodge, 2 runs on the middle and leg stump line, swung to long leg
Borren to Hodge, 1 run corrects the line, gets it outside off and is driven to long-off
Borren to Clarke, 1 run Clarke gets Hodge back on strike - he is on 98, with a nudge to backward point
Borren to Hodge, 2 runs Gets to his maiden ODI ton. Well done Hodge. Reached the landmark with a drive to wide long-off
Borren to Hodge, 2 runs Bosh! Took his left leg out of the line and swung a length-delivery to deep midwicket.
Borren to Hodge, SIX runs Wow! This one has disappeared over long-on. The assault is getting ferocious minute by minute. A fullish delivery outside off stump was swung over long-on.

Ryan ten Doeschate to Ponting, OUT Wow what a fantastic catch by ten Doeschate! Ponting smashes a low full toss, low to the right of the bowler, who swoops down in a hurry to take the catch. Fab effort.
Ryan ten Doeschate to Hodge, 1 run on the middle and leg, worked to backward square-leg
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, 2 runs again worked through the backward square-leg area
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, no run another low full toss, on the middle stump, Clarke doesn't hit it straight back like Ponting, whips it towards mid-on
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, no run yorker! on the middle stump line, dug out back to the bowler
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, no run another one, almost at the blockhole, on the off stump line, jabbed away down the track. A fine over comes to an end.
de Leede to Hodge, no run slower one again. Defended off the front foot.
de Leede to Hodge, 1 run length-delivery, just outside off stump, run down to third man
de Leede to Clarke, 1 run full in length, lands just outside off, comes in a touch, pushed towards mid-on and Clarke sets off for a run
de Leede to Hodge, no run on the off and middle stump line, Hodge was a trifle early into his drive and it goes in the air but falls short of the bowler
de Leede to Hodge, no run on the middle and leg, worked to square-leg
de Leede to Hodge, 1 run back of length, just outside off stump, guided to third man region
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, 1 run Fullish, on the middle stump line, drilled to long--on
Ryan ten Doeschate to Hodge, FOUR runs Nails another boundary. Another length-delivery has been imperiously dismissed over midwicket.

Ryan ten Doeschate to Hodge, FOUR runs Non-violence follows violence. Same result though. Low full toss on the middle and leg stump line, and Hodge just flicked it away. Caressed it away to long leg boundary
Ryan ten Doeschate to Hodge, 1 run back to swiping. Fetches a delivery from outside off and sends it past midwicket
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, no run Full-pitched on the middle and leg, driven back to the bowler
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, 1 leg bye on the leg and middle stump line, heaved away to long leg
Borren to Clarke, 1 leg bye Huge huge shout for lbw as Clarke misses a low full-toss while trying to lap it to on side. Struck just outside the off stump and hence he survives.
Borren to Hodge, SIX runs Imperious. He walks down the track, ala Hayden, and swings a length-delivery over deep midwicket. The 'roo doll must be up in the clouds.

Borren to Hodge, OUT Hodge falls. What a knock it has been. A real blitz. The end came as he tried to go for another big one. A fullish delivery, on the off and middle stump line and Hodge shapes to swing it away, misses it completely and is cleaned up.
Borren to Hussey, no run
Borren to Hussey, 1 run length-delivery on the off stump, punched through the line to long off
Borren to Clarke, 1 run Clarke charges down the track and hits through the line of a length-delivery, down to long-on
Ryan ten Doeschate to Hodge, no run beaten! probing delivery, outside off stump, hint of movement away and Hodge is sucked into a near-fatal drive.
Ryan ten Doeschate to Hodge, 2 wide slips down the leg side, 'keeper, standing up to the stumps, palms it away to fine leg
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, no run full and on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, 1 run fullish, on the leg and middle, whipped to deep midwicket
Ryan ten Doeschate to Hodge, no run full in length, driven back to the bowler
Ryan ten Doeschate to Hodge, 1 leg bye shout for lbw but going down. It landed on a length, on the middle stump line, veered towards leg, and rapped Hodge on the pad.
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, 1 wide another wide down the leg side
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, FOUR runs classy off drive. Full-pitched outside off and he leant on to his drive. Placed it to left of mid-off. Purrfectly done.
de Leede to Hodge, 3 runs slow off cutter on the off and middle, lapped past midwicket and they run hard to get three

de Leede to Clarke, 1 leg bye huge shout for lbw. Full-pitched, just outside off stump, comes back in and beats the intended drive and raps him on the front pad. But point of impact was outside off stump.
de Leede to Hodge, FOUR runs short of length, outside off and cut past point. Fiesty shot.
de Leede to Hodge, 1 run fullish, on the middle, driven to mid-on
de Leede to Clarke, 1 run full , in the channel outside off, driven to mid-off
de Leede to Hodge, no run lands on a length, just outside off, guided to backward point
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, 1 run slips down the leg side, Clarke tries to swing it away , misses and the ball runs off the pads to the off side
Ryan ten Doeschate to Hussey, 1 run short of length, outside off stump, cut to deep point.
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, 1 run
Ryan ten Doeschate to Hussey, OUT Hussey goes. He smashes a fullish delivery to long-on but couldn't clear the man at the deep. He had to go for it, just one more over left.
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, 2 wide Wide down the leg side. Deflected by the 'keeper
Ryan ten Doeschate to Watson, 1 run full-pitched on the off stump, driven to long-off
Ryan ten Doeschate to Clarke, SIX runs Clarke sends our friend Warren a reminder:-) He slaps a length-delivery on the stumps over deep midwicket for his first six of the day. Hodge had 7.
Borren to Watson, FOUR runs Watson imposes himself on the proceedings with a clean drive down the ground.
Borren to Watson, 1 run on the leg and middle, driven to long-on for a single. Clarke on strike now. Will he go another big hit?
Borren to Clarke, SIX runs Yes he does! For his second six of the day. Charges down the track and lofts a fullish delivery over long-on.
Borren to Clarke, SIX runs Another almighty swing and it has been deposited on the top of the roof! A low full toss and he biffed it over the cow corner. The cows are getting really bruised today.
Borren to Clarke, 1 run Clarke attempts another massive heave, not much wood on leather and he will have to be contend with just a single. Over to Watson.
Borren to Watson, SIX runs Watto finishes the innings off in style. Another Dutch full-toss, another brutal Aussie swing, again the cow corner has been peppered.
It has been a slaughter and Australia have ended up with a huge 358. Join us in a while to catch up with the Netherlands chase.
Two slips in place. Bracken to bowl to Zuiderant
Bracken to Zuiderent, no run a lovely inswinger to start off, almost squeezed through the bat and pad gap. Gets a inside-edge on to the pad.
Bracken to Zuiderent, no run lands on a length, bends back in , another inside-edge on to the pad. Bracken is homing in. Lethally.
Bracken to Zuiderent, no run puts bat to ball. Just outside off stump, pushed to the off side.
Bracken to Zuiderent, no run slants away in the channel outside off stump and left alone. Bracken will mix things up here.
Bracken to Zuiderent, no run lands on a length, comes in, dabbed away to the off side.
Bracken to Zuiderent, no run Bend it like Bracken. Another one that curved back in and thudded into the pad. Going down leg side though.

Tait to Reekers, no run Almost cleans up with a late outswinger. It landed on the off stump line and shaped away, Reekers is squared-up by the movement and the ball whizzes past the outside edge, past the off stump.
Tait to Reekers, FOUR runs Clipped away! Drifting on to the pads and forced off the back foot, past square-leg
Tait to Reekers, 2 runs What a cheeky shot! Length-delivery on the middle stump line, lapped away through midwicket.
Tait to Reekers, no run bounces past the leg stump, banged in short, tries to pull it away but misses.
Tait to Reekers, 1 run Another short pitched stuff, at the body, Reekers pivots to pull it to fine leg
Tait to Zuiderent, no run peach of a delivery. Beautiful outswinger that curved away, a lame poke by Zuiderant.
Bracken to Reekers, no run again Bracken bends it back in, Reekers arrests his front foot movement and brings the bat around, pushes it to the on side
Bracken to Reekers, no run Reekers attempts to counterpunch. Charges at a length delivery and tries to swing it across but makes no contact

Bracken to Reekers, FOUR runs Ah! the good old inside-edge to fine leg boundary. The lemon cut. Fullish and outside off stump, Reekers, maybe expecting a short pitched delvery, stays where he is and then has a flash at it. The bat comes down late but he gets a lucky edge.
Bracken to Reekers, no run this one goes with the angle, left alone
Bracken to Reekers, 1 run full and a touch wide outside off stump, Reekers drives to mid-off

Bracken to Zuiderent, 1 run slashed away! Zuiderant frees his arms at the width offered and slashes it through backward point. McGrath gets around from widish third man to make a neat stop near the ropes.
Tait to Zuiderent, no run full and straight, on the middle and leg, pushed to mid-on
Tait to Zuiderent, no run rushes through the channel outside off, left alone
Tait to Zuiderent, 1 wide slips down the leg side. Wide called.
Tait to Zuiderent, 1 wide And again. Tait loses control again. That slingy action.
Tait to Zuiderent, no run gets it right this time. Through the corridor outside off stump, left alone
Tait to Zuiderent, no run And again. A touch wide and Zuiderant threatened a drive but resists the urge.
Tait to Zuiderent, 1 leg bye on to the legs again, runs off the pad for a run.
Tait to Reekers, 1 wide well outside off stump, Reekers chases it but can't reach it
Tait to Reekers, FOUR runs top-edged over the outstretched hand of Gilchrist! Banged in short and Reekers pulls but is beaten by the pace.
Bracken to Zuiderent, no run leans forward, opens the bat-face, guides a length-delivery to cover point
Bracken to Zuiderent, no run full in length, on the middle stump line, driven to mid-on
Bracken to Zuiderent, FOUR runs Wow! He smacked that. Overpitched outside off and Zuiderant thrust his left foot out and creamed it through widish mid-off. Some shot that.
Bracken to Zuiderent, no run slower one, around off, pushed to cover
Bracken to Zuiderent, 1 run in the channel outside off, run down to third man
Bracken to Reekers, FOUR runs Whack! Full-pitched on the off and middle stump line, drilled on the up past the bowler. What a shot! Some statement of intent.
Tait to Zuiderent, 1 run short of length, outside off stump, dabbed to third man
Tait to Reekers, no run full in length, around off and middle, pushed out to cover region
Tait to Reekers, no run goes back and across, and swat-pulls a length delivery just outside off to mid-on!
Tait to Reekers, no run 145.1 kmph, banged in short and outside off, Reekers wants to send it out to cow corner but is beaten by the extra bounce.
Tait to Reekers, 1 run goes for a yorker, dabbed to square-leg. Diving stop there by Hodge and he has a shy at non-striker's end, if he had hit Reekers would have been a goner.
Tait to Zuiderent, no run attempted yorker, on the off stump line, square-driven to point

Bracken to Reekers, FOUR runs Reekers is in some mood. He is not going to mess around. A length-delivery on middle and leg stump line has been forced away to long-leg. He shuffled across and lapped it around the corner
Bracken to Reekers, no run on the off stump line, on a length, pushed to the off side
Bracken to Kervezee, no run beaten in the channel outside off. Goes with the angle.
Bracken to Ryan ten Doeschate, 1 run on the middle stump line, nudged through backward point
Tait to Ryan ten Doeschate, 1 wide well outside the off stump, left alone.
Tait to Ryan ten Doeschate, no run full and outside off stump, pushed out to cover
Tait to Ryan ten Doeschate, no run bouncer ,swayed away
Tait to Ryan ten Doeschate, no run full in length, on the middle stump line, dug out past the bowler.
Tait to Ryan ten Doeschate, no run Similar delivery, jabbed away to mid-off.
Tait to van Troost, no run almost cleaned up. Screaming fullish delivery, just outside off stump, the bat comes down late, the ball squeezes under the bat but just misses the off stump
Bracken to Zuiderent, no run
Bracken to Zuiderent, no run on a length, around off stump, leans forward, defends
Bracken to Zuiderent, no run
Bracken to Zuiderent, 1 run full-pitched on the off stump, driven to mid-off.
Bracken to van Troost, no run lands on a length, outside off, punched to cover
Bracken to van Troost, no run swing and a miss. Gives the charge and tries to swing it to the on side, misses and the ball flies over the middle stump
McGrath to Zuiderent, 1 run on the off stump line, cuts in a touch, stabs at it, gets a inside-edge and towards short fineleg
McGrath to van Bunge, FOUR runs streaky edge past third slip. Short of length, outside off stump, a firm push and a outside edge.
McGrath to van Bunge, no run full in length, on the middle and off stump line, defended on the front foot
McGrath to van Bunge, 1 run
McGrath to Zuiderent, no run full in length, on the middle and off, nudged to the on side.
Bracken to van Bunge, no run in the channel outside off stump, left alone
Bracken to van Bunge, no run slow off cutter outside off, left alone
Bracken to van Bunge, 1 run short of length, outside off, run down to third man
Bracken to Zuiderent, no run on the off stump line, driven to cover
Bracken to Zuiderent, no run around off stump, pushed to cover

Bracken to Zuiderent, OUT Australia are all over Netherlands. A run out now adds to the Dutch woes. short of length, on the off stump line, he nudges to point and sets off for a fatal run. He is sent back but can't make it back in time to beat the throw from Clarke.
McGrath to van Bunge, no run teases the outside edge with a delivery that whoosed through the channel outside off.
McGrath to van Bunge, no run homes in on the off stump, pushed out to point
McGrath to van Bunge, FOUR runs top-edged over the 'keeper's head. Banged in short, almost shovelled over his head as he gets into a tangle. It thuds into the glove and flies over Gilchrist
McGrath to van Bunge, 1 run on a length, outside off, dabbed to third man
McGrath to de Leede, no run on the middle stump line, patted to the off side
McGrath to de Leede, no run length-delivery on the off stump, punched to point
Bracken to van Bunge, SIX runs Meaty blow over long-off. Van Bunge leans forward and just goes through with the line. Up and over she soared.
Bracken to van Bunge, no run
Bracken to van Bunge, no run on the off stump line, bends in slightly, jabbed away to point

Bracken to van Bunge, FOUR runs slapped away through midwicket. van Bunge, the man who gave away 6 sixes the other day, is turning on the offense here. IT was a length delivery on the middle stump and he swiped it away
Bracken to van Bunge, 1 run pinches a single with a drive to right of mid-on
Bracken to de Leede, no run beaten. Lands on the off and middle and goes on with the angle.
McGrath to van Bunge, no run gives the charge to McGrath but doesn't quite get hold of the shot and the ball rolls over to McGrath
McGrath to van Bunge, no run yorker on the off stump line, dug out by van Bunge
McGrath to van Bunge, no run down he comes again, McGrath bangs it short and the ball flies over the flashing blade
McGrath to van Bunge, no run gets behind a length-delivery and defends
McGrath to van Bunge, no run full-pitched on the middle stump line, driven to mid-on
McGrath to van Bunge, 2 runs slap-slogged away. Back-of-length delivery on the off stump has been swung over wide mid-on.
Tait to de Leede, 1 wide well outside off stump, has a wild swish but no contact
Tait to de Leede, 1 run short of length, outside off, dabbed to third man
Tait to van Bunge, 2 runs full and fast, on the middle stump line, flicked past squareleg
Tait to van Bunge, no run 140.6 kmph, full and outside off, left alone
Tait to van Bunge, 1 run on the off stump line, dabbed away to the on side
Tait to de Leede, 1 run overpitched outside off, driven to point and rushes across for a quick single
Tait to van Bunge, no run banged in short, pushed to the off side
McGrath to de Leede, no run banged in on the pads, de Leede tries to turn it to the on side, the ball hits the pads and lobs towards the slips
McGrath to de Leede, 1 run pitched outside off, de Leede opens the face and glides it to third man
McGrath to van Bunge, no run skiddy delivery outside off, the ball keeps a little low and van Bunge misses it
McGrath to van Bunge, no run van Bunge drops it down with soft hands and the ball nearly trickes onto the stumps
McGrath to van Bunge, no run pushed to the off side

McGrath to van Bunge, no run down the track and missed! that was a rather strange shot, van Bunge gives room, steps down the track, suddenly withdraws his bat in the last second, lets it go to Gilchrist
Tait to de Leede, no run de Leede pushes it towards cover, searching for the run
Tait to de Leede, no run yorker length, reverse swing, de Leede just manages to get some bat onto it
Tait to de Leede, 4 byes yorker and squeezed out! swinging on middle and leg, de Leede gets the toe edge of the bat and the ball just misses a diving Gilchrist
Tait to de Leede, FOUR runs full and despatched past the covers! Tait tries a little too hard to slip in the yorker but gets the direction wrong
Tait to de Leede, no run reverse swing again, the ball hits the pads as he tries to hit it past midwicket
Tait to de Leede, 1 run cut away towards point with soft hands, de Leede takes off and picks up a single
McGrath to de Leede, no run well directed short ball, de Leede ducks and stumbles a little
McGrath to de Leede, 1 run slower delivery, de Leede gets his bat down hard, times it well and the ball goes to mid-on
McGrath to van Bunge, 1 run
McGrath to de Leede, no run full-pitched on the middle stump line, driven down the track
McGrath to de Leede, FOUR runs Slower one but he picks it up early and drills it inside-out through cover. Super shot that.
McGrath to de Leede, 1 run full and on the middle stump line, jabbed away, gets an inside-edge to square-leg
Hogg to de Leede, no run turns in from outside off, pushed to the off side.
Hogg to de Leede, no run floated outside off stump, padded away. They shout for lbw but it didn't spin in enough
Hogg to de Leede, no run there comes the googly, on the off and middle, he drives and gets an outside edge. Didn't spot it.
Hogg to Borren, FOUR runs Blast! Leans forward and drills a fullish delivery through mid-on
Hogg to Borren, no run lands on the line of stumps, turns in, he is rapped on the pads as he goes forward in defense. But going down.
McGrath to van Bunge, 1 run inswinging delivery, full in length, on the off and middle, driven down the ground
McGrath to Borren, 1 run on the off stump line, a forward jab, gets a inside-edge , to short fine leg
McGrath to van Bunge, FOUR runs chipped over mid-off! Slower one, van Bunge was slightly early into his drive, ends up chipping it over the 30-yard circle.

McGrath to van Bunge, OUT World Cup victim no 50. full in length, lands just outside off stump and shapes back in. van Bunge, who was looking in pretty good nick out there, shufled back and stabbed at it. The ball squeezed through and struck him in front of the off stump
McGrath to Smits, no run
McGrath to Smits, no run comes down the track and is greeted by a bouncer and he ducks under it.
Hogg to Borren, 1 run full toss, paddled away to deep back ward square-leg
Hogg to Smits, no run on the off stump line, turns in, driven to cover
Hogg to Smits, no run spins in from outside off, padded away but again didn't do enough to cause damage
Hogg to Smits, no run googly, slightly short on the off stump line and breaks away. He shapes to cut but withdraws at the last minute
Hogg to Smits, no run
Hogg to Smits, 2 runs tossed on the middle and leg stump line, wrong'un, attempted sweep and it bounds off, over Gilchrist, off a top edge
McGrath to Borren, 1 leg bye slips down leg side, raps him on the pads
McGrath to Smits, no run short of length, in the corridor outside off, has a slash but no wood on leather
McGrath to Smits, 1 run full in length, hint of inswing, jabbed away
McGrath to Borren, FOUR runs Smooth. Clean as a whistle. Full-pitched delivery outside off and driven uppishly through extra cover
McGrath to Borren, no run low full toss, punched to cover
McGrath to Borren, no run just outside off, defended on the front foot
Hogg to Smits, no run spins in from outside off, dabbed to slip
Hogg to Smits, no run tossed up on the off stump line, pushed back down the track
Hogg to Adeel Raja, 1 run turns in towards the hip, tucked to backward square-leg
Hogg to Borren, no run super googly. landed outside leg stump and broke away. Batsman didn't have much clue about that.
Hogg to Borren, SIX runs He had more than a clue about this. Leans forward and swings, a tossed-up delivery on the middle, over deep midwicket. Smack!
McGrath to Adeel Raja, no run in the zone outside off, left alone
McGrath to Adeel Raja, no run
McGrath to Adeel Raja, no run shuffles across, tries to dab it away to the on side but is beaten by the straightening of the delivery and is rapped high on the thigh
McGrath to Adeel Raja, 1 run around off stump line, nudged to backward point where Ponting makes the stop
McGrath to Borren, no run banged in short, rises shoulder-high, fended off the front foot
McGrath to Borren, no run fuller, hint of inswing, on the off and middle, driven back down the track, McGrath stretches his right hand out to make a half-stop
Hogg to Adeel Raja, no run lands outside off stump, turns in slightly, pushed to silly point
Hogg to Adeel Raja, no run googly and again another batsman is beaten. They are not picking him well.
Hogg to Adeel Raja, FOUR runs wallops the orthodox legbreak, right over the bowler's head.
Hogg to Adeel Raja, no run leans forward to smother the spin
Hogg to Adeel Raja, 1 run full toss, just pushed away to wide mid-off for a single
Hogg to Borren, FOUR runs Heaved away! A googly but he swept it on the length. Leant forward and slog-swept it to right of deep midwicket fielder.
Tait to Adeel Raja, no run outside off stump, goes on straight, left alone
Tait to Adeel Raja, no run beaten. Fuller and just outside off stump, curves away a touch, Raja pushes at it, inside the line
Tait to Adeel Raja, no run another one, at the blockhole length, but again just outside off stump. He needs to get his radar right.
Tait to Adeel Raja, 1 run again yorker-length, just outside off stump, a stab and a inside-edge results
Tait to Borren, no run length-delivery, on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
Tait to Borren, 1 leg bye swings to the legs, nudged to square-leg
Hogg to Borren, no run turns in from outside off, dabbed to point
Hogg to Borren, FOUR runs Smashed away! Tossed-up outside off and flat-batted down the ground.
Hogg to Jonkman, no run full and just outside off, worked to the on side

Hogg to Jonkman, OUT It's all over. Googly does the trick. Rips across a wrong'un, on the middle and off stump line, and he didn't pick it. Jonkman tried to work it to on side, fails to maintain balance and drags his feet out of the crease. Gilchrist whips off the bails in a flash to terminate Netherlands' inn
This is Sriram Veera, signing off.

""The news was pretty devastating, to be honest. He was a very, very close friend, actually more than as a coach.... He was a very respected man. We were together with Warwickshire and South Africa. Bob was an extremely professional man, was an extremely soft person, gave his life to cricket and probably paid for it.

A comprehensive victory for Australia. They win by 229 runs. The cricketing world, meanwhile, has been engulfed by the tragic news of Bob Woolmer's death. Do click here to read some early tributes. I shall leave you with the one from Allan Donald.
Australia won by 229 runs
Player of the match is Brad Hodge, AUS
